sets.name: Mighty Micros: Wolverine vs. Magneto
sets.description:
Stage a mutant-powered battle between Wolverine and Magneto. Wolverine has long claws and a Mighty Micros jet featuring extendable wings to help him escape being pulled in by Magneto’s magnet-shaped car and magnetic powers. Includes two minifigures with mini legs.

  • Includes Wolverine and Magneto minifigures with mini legs.
  • Wolverine's Mighty Micros jet features four movable wings.
  • Magneto's Mighty Micros car features a classic magnet shape at the rear.
  • Use Wolverine's claws to swipe at Magneto.
  • Accessory elements include Magneto's decorated-translucent magnetic power.
  • This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
  • Wolverine's Mighty Micros jet with wings folded in measures over 1” (3cm) high, 1” (5cm) long and 1” (4cm) wide.
  • Magneto's Mighty Micros car measures over 1” (3cm) high, 1” (5cm) long and 1” (4cm) wide.
